name: Oddities: The Maneki Neko
description:
This is my first VN and even though its SUPER short it took me like 8 hours...yikes

I've always wanted to make a VN and I decided to just do it! I want to make more one day. This is just based on a SUPER edgy dream I had. It's ok to cringe I won't be upset.  I'm just uploading because I want my friends to see but if someone else plays it I hope they at least...like it? thank you either way!!
